question: [Challenge] Turkce: (155, 173), (128, 171), (157, 65) noktalarindan olusan ucgenin alanini ve cevresini hesapla.

qas.question: [Challenge] Turkce: (155, 173), (128, 171), (157, 65) noktalarindan olusan ucgenin alanini ve cevresini hesapla.
[Calm] Polski: Oblicz pole i obwod trojkata o wierzcholkach (155, 173), (128, 171), (157, 65). Provide only the area.
[Note] Portugues: Calcule a area e o perimetro do triangulo definido por (155, 173), (128, 171), (157, 65). Provide only the perimeter.
